verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Vindicate <S%H8199><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for I have walked <S%H1980><s%> in my integrity; <S%H8537><s%> And I have trusted <S%H982><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> wavering. <S%H4571><s%>
Examine <S%H974><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and try <S%H5254><s%> me; Test <S%H6884><s%> my mind <S%H3629><s%> and my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
For Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> And I have walked <S%H1980><s%> in Thy truth. <S%H571><s%>
I do not sit <S%H3427><s%> with deceitful <S%H7723><s%> men, <S%H4962><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> will I go <S%H935><s%> with pretenders. <S%H5956><s%>
I hate <S%H8130><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> And I will not sit <S%H3427><s%> with the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
I shall wash <S%H7364><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in innocence, <S%H5356><s%> And I will go <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> Thine altar, <S%H4196><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%>
That I may proclaim <S%H8085><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> And declare <S%H5608><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Thy wonders. <S%H6381><s%>
O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I love <S%H157><s%> the habitation <S%H4583><s%> of Thy house, <S%H1004><s%> And the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H4908><s%> Thy glory <S%H9202><s%> dwells. <S%H4908><s%>
Do not take <S%H622><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> away <S%H622><s%> [along] with sinners, <S%H2400><s%> Nor <S%H408><s%> my life <S%H9132><s%> with men <S%H376><s%> of bloodshed, <S%H1818><s%>
In whose <S%H834><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> is a wicked <S%H2154><s%> scheme, <S%H2154><s%> And whose right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bribes. <S%H7810><s%>
But as for me, I shall walk <S%H1980><s%> in my integrity; <S%H8537><s%> Redeem <S%H6299><s%> me, and be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me.
My foot <S%H7272><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> on a level <S%H4334><s%> place; <S%H4334><s%> In the congregations <S%H4721><s%> I shall bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
